species.name: jumpluff
descriptions: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.
Drifts on seasonal winds and spreads its cotton-like spores all over the world to make more offspring.
Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff to make its way to any place in the world it wants.
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pok√©mon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
Once it catches the wind, it deftly controls its cotton-puff spores-- it can even float around the world.

abilities.name: leaf-guard
abilities.effect: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.

abilities.name: infiltrator
abilities.effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
